application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: 1-8 INC Neville House & Neville House Garages, Neville Road, 1-64 INC Winterleys and Seahorse Day Nursery, Albert Road, 113-128 Carlton House and Carlton House Hall, Canterbury Terrace  London, NW6
description: Details pursuant to condition 39 (Cycle Storage Facilities), of Variation of Conditions application reference 23/1935 dated 31/10/2023 for Variation of conditions 2 (approved drawings and documents), 18 (compliance with approved noise assessment), 31 (communal television system/satellite dishes), 32 (photovoltaic panel arrays on the roofs), 37 (affordable housing), 38 (private residential), 41 (landscaping including tree planting) and 43 (child play equipment) of Deemed (Reg4 Councils Other Development) reference 18/4920 dated 3 July, 2020, with later NMA to vary Description under reference 23/2116  for Demolition of all existing buildings and erection of a part six, nine, ten and twelve storey building arranged around a courtyard (Western Building) providing residential units and a part four, five, eight, nine and ten storey L shaped building (Eastern Building) providing residential units. The provision of a pedestrian and cycle shared surface along Neville Road, with associated cycle provision, bin stores, landscaping and ancillary works (Revised Description).
